com.example.cmplibrary

Class ConsentLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.cmplibrary.ConsentLib

  • public class ConsentLib
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point class encapsulating the Consents a giving user has given to one or several vendors. It offers methods to get custom vendors consents as well as IAB consent purposes. 
    
      ConsentLib cLib = ConsentLib.newBuilder()
                     .setActivity(this)
                     .setAccountId(YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID)
                     .setSiteName("A_SITE_NAME")
                     .setOnInteractionComplete(new ConsentLib.Callback() {
                         public void run(ConsentLib c) {
                                 c.getCustomVendorConsents(
                                         new String[]{"VENDOR_ID"},
                                         new ConsentLib.OnLoadComplete() {
                                             public void onSuccess(Object result) {
                                                 Log.i(TAG, "custom vendor consent 1: " + ((boolean[]) result)[0]);
                                             }
                                         });
                                 c.getPurposeConsents(
                                         new ConsentLib.OnLoadComplete() {
                                             public void onSuccess(Object result) {
                                                 ConsentLib.PurposeConsent[] results = (ConsentLib.PurposeConsent[]) result;
                                                 for (ConsentLib.PurposeConsent purpose : results) {
                                                     Log.i(TAG, "Consented to purpose: " + purpose.name);
                                                 }
                                             }
                                         });
                                 c.getPurposeConsent(
                                         "PURPOSE_ID",
                                         new ConsentLib.OnLoadComplete() {
                                             public void onSuccess(Object result) {
                                                 Log.i(TAG, "Consented to PURPOSE: " + ((Boolean) result).toString());
                                             }
                                         });
                         }
                     })
                     .build();
                 cLib.run();

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.Integer choiceType
      After the user has chosen an option in the WebView, this attribute will contain an integer indicating what was that choice.
      static java.lang.String CONSENT_UUID_KEY 
      java.lang.String consentUUID 
      static java.lang.String EU_CONSENT_KEY 
      java.lang.String euconsent 
      static java.lang.String IAB_CONSENT_CMP_PRESENT
      If the user has consent data stored, reading for this key in the shared preferences will return "1"
      static java.lang.String IAB_CONSENT_CONSENT_STRING
      They key used to store the IAB Consent string for the user in the shared preferences
      static java.lang.String IAB_CONSENT_PARSED_PURPOSE_CONSENTS
      They key used to read and write the parsed IAB Purposes consented by the user in the shared preferences
      static java.lang.String IAB_CONSENT_PARSED_VENDOR_CONSENTS
      They key used to read and write the parsed IAB Vendor consented by the user in the shared preferences
      static java.lang.String IAB_CONSENT_SUBJECT_TO_GDPR
      If the user is subject to GDPR, reading for this key in the shared preferences will return "1" otherwise "0"

    • Method Detail

      • newBuilder

        public static ConsentLib.ActivityStep newBuilder()
        Returns:
        a new instance of ConsentLib.Builder

      • run

        public void run()
         throws ConsentLibException.NoInternetConnectionException
        Communicates with SourcePoint to load the message. It all happens in the background and the WebView will only show after the message is ready to be displayed (received data from SourcePoint). The Following keys should will be available in the shared preferences storage after this method is called:
        • IAB_CONSENT_CMP_PRESENT
        • IAB_CONSENT_SUBJECT_TO_GDPR
        Throws:
        ConsentLibException.NoInternetConnectionException - - thrown if the device has lost connection either prior or while interacting with ConsentLib

      • getCustomVendorConsent

        public void getCustomVendorConsent(java.lang.String customVendorId,
                                   ConsentLib.OnLoadComplete callback)
                            throws ConsentLibException.ApiException
        This method receives a String indicating the custom vendor id and a callback that will be called with true or false indicating if the user has given consent or not to that vendor.
        Parameters:
        customVendorId - custom vendor id - currently needs to be provided by SourcePoint
        callback - - callback that will be called with a boolean indicating if the user has given consent or not to that vendor.
        Throws:
        ConsentLibException.ApiException - will be throw in case something goes wrong when communicating with SourcePoint

      • getCustomVendorConsents

        public void getCustomVendorConsents(java.lang.String[] customVendorIds,
                                    ConsentLib.OnLoadComplete callback)
                             throws ConsentLibException.ApiException
        This method receives an Array of Strings representing the custom vendor ids you want to get the consents for and a callback.
        The callback will be called with an Array of booleans once the data is ready. If the element i of this array is true it means the user has consented to the vendor index i from the customVendorIds parameter. Otherwise it will be false.
        Parameters:
        customVendorIds - an array of vendor ids - currently needs to be provided by SourcePoint
        callback - - callback that will be called with an array of boolean indicating if the user has given consent or not to those vendors.
        Throws:
        ConsentLibException.ApiException - will be throw in case something goes wrong when communicating with SourcePoint

      • getPurposeConsent

        public void getPurposeConsent(java.lang.String id,
                              ConsentLib.OnLoadComplete callback)
                       throws ConsentLibException.ApiException
        This method receives a String indicating the id of a purpose and a callback that will be called with true or false indicating if the user has given consent or not to that purpose.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of a purpose - needs to be provided by SourcePoint
        callback - - called with a boolean indicating if the user has given consent to that purpose
        Throws:
        ConsentLibException.ApiException - will be throw in case something goes wrong when communicating with SourcePoint
        See Also:
        getPurposeConsents(OnLoadComplete)

      • getPurposeConsents

        public void getPurposeConsents(ConsentLib.OnLoadComplete callback)
                        throws ConsentLibException.ApiException
        This method receives a callback which is called with an Array of all the purposes (ConsentLib.PurposeConsent) the user has given consent for.
        Parameters:
        callback - called with an array of ConsentLib.PurposeConsent
        Throws:
        ConsentLibException.ApiException - will be throw in case something goes wrong when communicating with SourcePoint

      • getIABVendorConsents

        public boolean[] getIABVendorConsents(int[] vendorIds)
                               throws ConsentLibException
        Given a list of IAB vendor IDs, returns a corresponding array of boolean each representing the consent was given or not to the requested vendor.
        Parameters:
        vendorIds - an array of standard IAB vendor IDs.
        Returns:
        an array with same size as vendorIds param representing the results in the same order.
        Throws:
        ConsentLibException - if the consent is not completed or the consent string is not present in userSharedPreferences.
